xmodel.name: Statistical Office
xmodel.description: Authors: Simon Gemkow, Philipp Harting, Sander van der Hoog

dataType.name: price_index_adt
dataType.description: Used by Eurostat to store data for a price index

variable.name: mean
variable.description: sample mean

variable.name: sd
variable.description: sample standard deviation

dataType.name: household_data
dataType.description: Used by Eurostat to store data of the different regions

variable.name: is_homeless
variable.description: Indicates whether the agent is homeless (0: No, 1:Yes)

variable.name: is_tenant
variable.description: Indicates whether the agent is a tenant (0: No, 1:Yes)

variable.name: is_owner
variable.description: Indicates whether the agent owns a house for own use (0: No, 1:Yes)

variable.name: is_landlord
variable.description: Indicates whether the agent owns an additional house for renting out (0: No, 1:Yes)

variable.name: has_btl_gene
variable.description: Indicates whether the agent has the buy-to-let gene (0: No, 1:Yes)

variable.name: defaulted_on_rent
variable.description: Set when tenant defaulted on rent

variable.name: evicted_as_tenant
variable.description: Set when tenant is evicted from rental unit

variable.name: evicted_as_owner
variable.description: Set when tenant is evicted from HMR

dataType.name: firm_data
dataType.description: Used by Eurostat to store data of the different regions

variable.name: total_earnings
variable.description: The sum of profits across all firms in the region

variable.name: total_debt
variable.description: The sum of debt across firms in the region

variable.name: total_assets
variable.description: The sum of assets across firms in the region

variable.name: total_equity
variable.description: The sum of equity across firms in the region

variable.name: average_debt_earnings_ratio
variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: regional average debt/earnings ratio across all firms in the region

variable.name: average_debt_equity_ratio
variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: regional average debt/equity ratio across all firms in the region

variable.name: labour_share_ratio
variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: regional average labour share across all firms in the region (defined as total wages divided by total profits)

variable.name: monthly_sold_quantity
variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: regional sum of sold quantity. Refers to the quantities sold by all firms located in the region (not necessarily equal to the total quantity sold in the region).

variable.name: monthly_output
variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: regional sum of output

variable.name: monthly_revenue
variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: regional sum of cum_revenue

variable.name: monthly_planned_output
variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: regional sum of planned output

variable.name: monthly_investment_value
variable.description: Monthly aggregate value of investment over all firms (capital costs).

variable.name: investment_gdp_ratio
variable.description: Ratio of investment/gdp.

variable.name: gdp
variable.description: GDP

variable.name: cpi
variable.description: Consumer price index

variable.name: cpi_last_month
variable.description: Consumer price index of previous month

variable.name: no_firm_births
variable.description: Number of firm births

variable.name: no_firm_deaths
variable.description: Number of firm deaths

dataType.name: firm_info_adt
dataType.description: Used by Firm to send to Eurostat (NOTE: differs from firm_data in Eurostat memory)

variable.name: total_mean_wage
variable.description: Total mean wage of all workers (production and innovation)

variable.name: mean_wage
variable.description: Mean wage of workers in production

variable.name: price_last_month
variable.description: Price of the consumption good in the last month

variable.name: quality
variable.description: Quality of the consumption good

variable.name: sold_quantity_in_calendar_month
variable.description: Monthly sum of sold quantities in the different malls

variable.name: age
variable.description: Age of the firm in months

dataType.name: household_info_adt
dataType.description: Used by Household to send to Eurostat (NOTE: differs from household_data in Eurostat memory)

variable.name: is_homeless
variable.description: Indicates whether the agent is homeless (0: No, 1:Yes)

variable.name: is_tenant
variable.description: Indicates whether the agent is a tenant (0: No, 1:Yes)

variable.name: is_owner
variable.description: Indicates whether the agent owns a house for own use (0: No, 1:Yes)

variable.name: is_landlord
variable.description: Indicates whether the agent owns an additional house for renting out (0: No, 1:Yes)

variable.name: has_btl_gene
variable.description: Indicates whether the agent has the buy-to-let gene (0: No, 1:Yes)

variable.name: defaulted_on_rent
variable.description: Set when tenant defaulted on rent

variable.name: evicted_as_tenant
variable.description: Set when tenant is evicted from rental unit

variable.name: evicted_as_owner
variable.description: Set when tenant is evicted from HMR

variable.name: interest_annuity_ratio
variable.description: Debt interest to annuity ratio

variable.name: hmr_interest_annuity_ratio
variable.description: HMR debt interest to annuity ratio

variable.name: op_interest_annuity_ratio
variable.description: OP debt interest to annuity ratio

variable.name: hmr_debt_service_to_income_ratio
variable.description: DSTI for HMR

variable.name: hh_mortgages_ltv_redraw
variable.description: Indicator to denote that HH has performed a redraw of DSTI, LTV, Maturity.

variable.name: hh_mortgages_ltv_cap_active
variable.description: Indicator to denote that HH has an active LTV cap.

variable.name: hh_mortgages_dsti_cap_active
variable.description: Indicator to denote that HH has an active DSTI cap.

variable.name: hh_no_mortgages
variable.description: Total number of mortgages

dataType.name: region_data_item
dataType.description: Used by Eurostat to store data from different regions

variable.name: cpi
variable.description: Consumer price index

variable.name: cpi_last_month
variable.description: Consumer price index of previous month

variable.name: gdp
variable.description: GDP across all firms in the region (GDP= C+I). Refers to total value sold by firms in the region_id.

variable.name: employment
variable.description: employment in region

variable.name: unemployment_rate
variable.description: unemployment_rate in region (from household_data)

variable.name: average_wage
variable.description: average_wage in region

variable.name: no_firms
variable.description: Number of firms

variable.name: no_active_firms
variable.description: Number of active firms

variable.name: no_firm_births
variable.description: Number of firm births

variable.name: no_firm_deaths
variable.description: Number of firm deaths

dataType.name: history_item
dataType.description: Used by Eurostat to store history data

variable.name: cpi
variable.description: Consumer price index.

variable.name: gdp
variable.description: Gross Domestic Product.

variable.name: output
variable.description: Total output produced (consumer products).

variable.name: employment
variable.description: Total employment.

variable.name: unemployment_rate
variable.description: Unemployment rate.

variable.name: unemployment_rate_skill_1
variable.description: Unemployment rate for skill level 1.

variable.name: unemployment_rate_skill_2
variable.description: Unemployment rate for skill level 2.

variable.name: unemployment_rate_skill_3
variable.description: Unemployment rate for skill level 3.

variable.name: unemployment_rate_skill_4
variable.description: Unemployment rate for skill level 4.

variable.name: unemployment_rate_skill_5
variable.description: Unemployment rate for skill level 5.

variable.name: average_wage
variable.description: Average wage economy-wide.

variable.name: no_firms
variable.description: Number of firms.

variable.name: no_active_firms
variable.description: Number of active firms.

variable.name: no_firm_births
variable.description: Number of firm births.

variable.name: no_firm_deaths
variable.description: Number of firm deaths.

variable.name: region_data
variable.description: In the history item we store the array region_data with data for all regions.

dataType.name: firm_stocks_adt
dataType.description: Datastructure containing balance sheet stocks of the firm

dataType.name: firm_outflows_adt
dataType.description: Datastructure containing balance sheet outflows of the firm

dataType.name: firm_inflows_adt
dataType.description: Datastructure containing balance sheet inflows of the firm

dataType.name: household_stocks_adt
dataType.description: Datastructure containing balance sheet stocks of the household

variable.name: initial_mortgage_main_residence
variable.description: Synthetic mortgage for HMR sampled from HFCS data.

variable.name: initial_mortgage_other_property
variable.description: Synthetic mortgage for OPs sampled from HFCS data.

variable.name: total_real_estate_value
variable.description: Real estate value.

variable.name: main_residence
variable.description: House adt for main residence.

variable.name: initial_other_property
variable.description: House adt for other property.

variable.name: rental_property_list
variable.description: List of rental properties.

dataType.name: household_outflows_adt
dataType.description: Datastructure containing balance sheet outflows of the household

dataType.name: household_inflows_adt
dataType.description: Datastructure containing balance sheet inflows of the household

dataType.name: bank_stocks_adt
dataType.description: Datastructure containing balance sheet stocks of the bank

variable.name: loan_loss_reserve
variable.description: Loan loss reserve total: firm loans and mortgage loans.

variable.name: loan_loss_reserve_firm_loans
variable.description: Loan loss reserve for non-performing firm loans.

variable.name: loan_loss_reserve_mortgage_loans
variable.description: Loan loss reserve for non-performing mortgage loans.

variable.name: total_mortgages
variable.description: Total value of outstanding mortgages in the mortgage loan portfolio.

dataType.name: bank_outflows_adt
dataType.description: Datastructure containing balance sheet outflows of the bank

dataType.name: bank_inflows_adt
dataType.description: Datastructure containing balance sheet inflows of the bank

variable.name: net_deposit_inflow
variable.description: deposit_inflow - deposit_outflow: should be the sum of all net_inflows of all other agents

dataType.name: gov_stocks_adt
dataType.description: Datastructure containing balance sheet stocks of the Government

dataType.name: gov_outflows_adt
dataType.description: Datastructure containing balance sheet outflows of the Government

dataType.name: gov_inflows_adt
dataType.description: Datastructure containing balance sheet inflows of the Government

variable.name: net_inflow
variable.description: total_income - total_expenses

dataType.name: ecb_stocks_adt
dataType.description: Datastructure containing balance sheet stocks of the Central Bank

variable.name: fiat_money
variable.description: This should equal all fiat money in the economy, it is a liability to the Central Bank.

variable.name: perpetuities_firms
variable.description: This should equal all initial fiat money supplied to firms, an asset to the Central Bank.

variable.name: perpetuities_banks
variable.description: This should equal all initial fiat money supplied to banks, an asset to the Central Bank.

variable.name: perpetuities_govs
variable.description: This should equal all initial fiat money supplied to govs, an asset to the Central Bank.

dataType.name: ecb_outflows_adt
dataType.description: Datastructure containing balance sheet outflows of the ECB

dataType.name: ecb_inflows_adt
dataType.description: Datastructure containing balance sheet inflows of the ECB

dataType.name: firm_balance_sheet_adt
dataType.description: ADT containing the firm balance sheet.

dataType.name: household_balance_sheet_adt
dataType.description: ADT containing the household balance sheet.

dataType.name: bank_balance_sheet_adt
dataType.description: ADT containing the bank balance sheet.

dataType.name: gov_balance_sheet_adt
dataType.description: ADT containing the Government balance sheet.

dataType.name: ecb_balance_sheet_adt
dataType.description: ADT containing the Central Bank balance sheet.

dataType.name: ts_adt
dataType.description: ADT for time series data.

variable.name: data
variable.description: Time series data array

variable.name: cv
variable.description: Coefficient of variation, SD/MEAN

variable.name: trailing_sum_qtr
variable.description: Trailing sum over last 3 months (one quarter)

variable.name: trailing_avg_qtr
variable.description: Trailing average over last 3 months

variable.name: trailing_sum_year
variable.description: Trailing sum over last 12 months

variable.name: trailing_avg_year
variable.description: Trailing average over last 12 months

dataType.name: series_adt
dataType.description: ADT for series data.

variable.name: current
variable.description: Current value

variable.name: ts
variable.description: Time series

dataType.name: history_adt
dataType.description: ADT for levels and growth rates data.

variable.name: levels
variable.description: Time series of levels

variable.name: pct_change_qoq_series
variable.description: Time series of pct change quarter-on-quarter

variable.name: pct_change_yoy_series
variable.description: Time series of pct change year-on-year

dataType.name: data_adt
dataType.description: ADT for economy and region data.

variable.name: economy
variable.description: history_adt for economy-wide data.

variable.name: regions
variable.description: Array of history_adt for region data.

variable.name: gov_balance_sheet_calendar
variable.description: Balance sheet consisting of adts for stocks and flows

variable.name: gov_stocks_calendar
variable.description: stock adt for monetary stocks at the end of the calendar month

variable.name: gov_outflows_calendar
variable.description: outflows adt for monetary outflows during the calendar month

variable.name: gov_inflows_calendar
variable.description: inflows adt for monetary outflows during the calendar month

variable.name: firm_balance_sheet_calendar
variable.description: Balance sheet consisting of adts for stocks and flows

variable.name: firm_stocks_calendar
variable.description: stock adt for monetary stocks at the end of the calendar month

variable.name: firm_outflows_calendar
variable.description: outflows adt for monetary outflows during the calendar month

variable.name: firm_inflows_calendar
variable.description: inflows adt for monetary outflows during the calendar month

variable.name: age
variable.description: Age of the firm in months.

variable.name: transfer_payment
variable.description: The transfer payment read from message.

variable.name: subsidy_pct
variable.description: The subsidy percentage read from message.

variable.name: active
variable.description: 0,1. Flag indicating whether the firm should start production activity.

variable.name: inactive
variable.description: 0,1. Opposite of the active flag. Used to filter out all non-bankrupt firms.

variable.name: zero_output
variable.description: 0,1. Zero output flag. Used to filter out all firms with zero output.

variable.name: bankruptcy_idle_counter
variable.description: Number of iterations before the bankrupt firm becomes active again and resumes production activity.

variable.name: bankruptcy_state
variable.description: 0,1. Flag indicating whether the firm is in bankruptcy.

variable.name: bankruptcy_insolvency_state
variable.description: 0,1. Flag indicating whether the firm is in bankruptcy case: insolvency.

variable.name: bankruptcy_illiquidity_state
variable.description: 0,1. Flag indicating whether the firm is in bankruptcy case: illiquidity.

variable.name: financial_crisis_state
variable.description: 0,1. Flag indicating whether the firm is in a financial crisis state.

variable.name: average_s_skill_from_eurostat
variable.description: The regional specific skill (firm average) computed by Eurostat and sent to firms. This variable is used when a firm is re-activated after bankruptcy.

variable.name: average_output_from_eurostat
variable.description: The regional firm average output computed by Eurostat and sent to firms. This variable is used when a firm is re-activated after bankruptcy.

variable.name: subsidy_payment
variable.description: Amount of subsidy payment received from Government

variable.name: indicator_earnings
variable.description: 0,1 indicator for positive net_earnings

variable.name: indicator_capital_costs
variable.description: 0,1 indicator for positive capital_costs

variable.name: indicator_size_by_capital_stock
variable.description: 0,1 indicator for total_units_capital_stock above economy mean capital stock

function.name: Firm_send_id_to_malls
function.description: Function to let Firms send IDs to Malls. The Malls set up their data array properly if the population file was built with the cloning procedure.

function.name: Firm_initialize_mall_arrays
function.description: In case of cloned population: Firms receive mall ids and set up their memory variables that are related to the malls.

function.name: Firm_send_initial_loan
function.description: Function for Firm to send initial loan to Bank.

function.name: Firm_read_initial_loan_id
function.description: Function for Firm to read initial loan ID from Bank.

function.name: Firm_reset_variables
function.description: Function to reset firm balance sheet flow variables. Activation: 1st day of calendar month.

function.name: idle
function.description: Firm does nothing

function.name: Firm_send_data_to_Eurostat
function.description: Function to send a data_message to the eurostat agent including several micro data.

function.name: Firm_compute_stock_flows
function.description: Firms compute stock and flows for blanace sheets.

function.name: idle
function.description: Firm does nothing

function.name: Firm_update_bank_account
function.description: Function to send end-of-day payment account data to the bank to update the account.

variable.name: household_balance_sheet_calendar
variable.description: Balance sheet consisting of adts for stocks and flows

variable.name: household_outflows_calendar
variable.description: outflows adt for monetary outflows during the calendar month

variable.name: household_inflows_calendar
variable.description: inflows adt for monetary outflows during the calendar month

variable.name: deposit_interest_rate
variable.description: Interest rate on the payment account.

variable.name: unemployment_benefit_pct
variable.description: Percentage of last earned wage that is received as unemployment benefit, the net replacement rate.

variable.name: transfer_payment
variable.description: Amount of the transfer payment.

variable.name: subsidy_pct
variable.description: The subsidy percentage read from message.

variable.name: total_income
variable.description: Sum of inflows: wage, unemployment benefits, dividends, interest.

variable.name: total_expenses
variable.description: Sum of outflows: taxes, consumption

variable.name: total_assets
variable.description: Total assets: payment account

variable.name: total_liabilities
variable.description: Total liabilities; none at this point.

variable.name: subsidy_payment
variable.description: Received subsidy payment from Government.

variable.name: region_mean_wage
variable.description: The mean_wage in the household's region. Used in the computation of the unemployment benefits.

variable.name: human_capital_policy_flag
variable.description: Indicator variable: If 1 then hc policy is currently installed

function.name: Household_reset_variables
function.description: Function to reset household balance sheet flow variables. Activation: 1st day of calendar month.

function.name: idle
function.description: Idle for initialization function.

function.name: Household_initialization
function.description: Initialization function for household.

function.name: idle
function.description: Idle for initialization function.

function.name: idle
function.description: Idle function to connect state Household_init_after_transient to function Household_init_mortgages.

function.name: idle
function.description: Function to side-track initialization of real-estate sectors: connect state init_00 to state Household_after_init_mortgages_rent_housing.

function.name: idle
function.description: Idle function to connect state Household_after_sanity_checks to function Household_Start_Monthly_Loop_Top.

function.name: Household_read_policy_announcements
function.description: Household reads policy announcements from Government.

function.name: Household_send_loan_portfolio_data
function.description: Household sends info on its mortgage loan.

function.name: Household_human_capital_policy
function.description: Household updates the general skill level in case of human capital policy.

function.name: Household_idle
function.description: Household does nothing.

function.name: idle
function.description: Idle for read_policy_announcement

function.name: Household_receive_account_interest
function.description: Household receives deposit interest on its payment account.

function.name: Household_send_data_to_Eurostat
function.description: Household sends message to the eurostat agent including several micro data.

function.name: idle
function.description: Idle for send_data_to_eurostat

function.name: Household_read_data_from_Eurostat
function.description: Read the region_wide_mean_wage.

variable.description: Switch to turn on/off datastorage

variable.name: hh_is_homeless
variable.description: Indicates sum of agents that are homeless (0: No, 1:Yes)

variable.name: hh_is_tenant
variable.description: Indicates sum of agents that are tenant (0: No, 1:Yes)

variable.name: hh_is_owner
variable.description: Indicates sum of agents that own a house for own use (0: No, 1:Yes)

variable.name: hh_is_landlord
variable.description: Indicates sum of agents that own an additional house for renting out (0: No, 1:Yes)

variable.name: hh_has_btl_gene
variable.description: Indicates sum of agents that have the buy-to-let gene (0: No, 1:Yes)

variable.name: hh_defaulted_on_rent
variable.description: Set when tenant defaulted on rent

variable.name: hh_evicted_as_tenant
variable.description: Set when tenant is evicted from rental unit

variable.name: hh_evicted_as_owner
variable.description: Set when tenant is evicted from HMR

variable.name: hh_hmr_debt_service_to_income_ratio
variable.description: Households actual DSTI

variable.name: hh_rent_to_income_ratio
variable.description: Households actual rent-to-income ration

variable.name: hh_payment_account_to_income_ratio
variable.description: Households actual payment account in relation to income

variable.name: hh_rent_buffer_in_months
variable.description: Households (hypothetical) buffer for rent payments

variable.name: hh_hmr_debt_service_buffer_in_months
variable.description: Households (hypothetical) buffer for hmr mortgage payments

variable.name: return_on_op
variable.description: Aggregated percentage return on OP business

variable.name: hh_no_mortgages
variable.description: Household number of mortgages.

variable.name: no_firms
variable.description: Number of firms in the economy

variable.name: no_active_firms
variable.description: Number of active firms.

variable.name: no_vacancies
variable.description: Number of vacancies in the economy

variable.name: no_posted_vacancies
variable.description: Number of posted vacancies in the economy

variable.name: no_employees
variable.description: Number of employees in the economy (in firms)

variable.name: no_employees_production
variable.description: Number of employees in the economy (in firm's production role)

variable.name: no_employees_r_and_d
variable.description: Number of r amd d employees in the economy (in firms)

variable.name: no_employees_skill_5

variable.name: firm_average_s_skill_5
variable.description: Average specific skills of general skill level 5 in firms in the economy

variable.name: firm_average_quality
variable.description: Average consumption good quality in the economy

variable.name: firm_average_price
variable.description: Average unweighted consumption good price of active firms

variable.name: region_firm_data
variable.description: Stores the eurostat memory variables concerning the firms for the different regions

variable.name: region_household_data
variable.description: Stores the eurostat memory variables concerning the households for the different regions

variable.name: total_earnings
variable.description: Total profits across firms (sum of net_earnings)

variable.name: total_debt
variable.description: Total debts across firms (sum of total_debt)

variable.name: total_assets
variable.description: Total value of assets across firms

variable.name: total_equity
variable.description: Total value of equity across firms

variable.name: average_debt_earnings_ratio
variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: average debt/earnings ratio across firms (total debt divided by total earnings)

variable.name: average_debt_equity_ratio
variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: average debt/equity ratio across firms (total debt divided by total equity)

variable.name: labour_share_ratio
variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: average labour share across firms (defined as total wages divided by total profits)

variable.name: cpi
variable.description: Consumer Price Index. Measured as a weighted price index across all firms, all malls, using as weights the firms' market shares.

variable.name: annual_inflation_rate_monthly
variable.description: Annual inflation rate based on the pct change of the CPI of the current month wrt. the same month in the previous year. Based on data stored in HISTORY_MONTHLY[i].cpi.

variable.name: annual_inflation_rate_quarterly
variable.description: Annual inflation rate based on the pct change of the CPI of the current quarter wrt. the same quarter in the previous year. Based on data stored in HISTORY_QUARTERLY[i].cpi.

variable.name: hpi
variable.description: Harmonized Price Index. Combines the CPI and the PPI. The investment value (investment goods price "weighted" with quantity, but since there is just one price, this reduces to the total investment value) is added to the weighted consumer prices.

variable.name: hmr_price_index
variable.description: Household Main Residence Price Index. Measured as a sample mean of all prices for residential housing units.

variable.name: hmr_price_data
variable.description: Household Main Residence Price Data. Collected data on all prices of residential housing units during a month, used for index computation, and reset at end of calandar month.

variable.name: op_price_index
variable.description: Other Property Price Index. Measured as a sample mean of all prices for non-residential housing units.

variable.name: op_price_data
variable.description: Other Property Price Data. Collected data on all prices of non-residential housing units during a month, used for index computation, and reset at end of calandar month.

variable.name: rent_price_index
variable.description: Rent Price Index. Measured as a sample mean of all rent prices for rental properties.

variable.name: rent_price_data
variable.description: Rent Price Data. Collected data on all rental prices for rental units during a month, used for index computation, and reset at end of calandar month.

variable.name: hmr_price_mean
variable.description: Mean of Household Main Residence Prices.

variable.name: hmr_price_cv
variable.description: Coefficient of variation of Household Main Residence Prices.

variable.name: op_price_mean
variable.description: Mean of Household Other Property Prices.

variable.name: op_price_cv
variable.description: Coefficient of variation of Household Other Property Prices.

variable.name: rent_price_mean
variable.description: Mean of Household rental prices.

variable.name: rent_price_cv
variable.description: Coefficient of variation of Household Rent Prices.

variable.name: count_tenants
variable.description: Number of tenants.

variable.name: count_owners
variable.description: Number of owners (occupiers of HMR).

variable.name: count_landlords
variable.description: Number of landlords (own HMR and OP).

variable.name: count_homeless
variable.description: Number of homeless.

variable.name: gdp
variable.description: GDP = Consumption + Investments (measured at firms, sum of cum_revenues + investment_costs)

variable.name: monthly_investment_value
variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: monthly value of investments, aggregating the firms capital costs.

variable.name: monthly_sold_quantity
variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: regional sum of sold quantity

variable.name: herfindahl_index
variable.description: herfindahl index indicating the concentration on the consumption goods market

variable.name: monthly_output
variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: regional sum of output

variable.name: monthly_potential_output
variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: firm sum of potential output (actual output/cap.utilization rate)

variable.name: monthly_revenue
variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: regional sum of cum_revenue

variable.name: monthly_planned_output
variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: regional sum of planned output

variable.name: price_index
variable.description: Constructed macrovariable: weighted mean prices

variable.name: history_monthly[13]
variable.description: History: monthly data

variable.name: history_quarterly[5]
variable.description: History: quarterly data

variable.name: monthly_growth_rates
variable.description: History: monthly growth rates

variable.name: quarterly_growth_rates
variable.description: History: quarterly growth rates

variable.name: annual_growth_rates_monthly
variable.description: History: annual growth rates measured each month

variable.name: annual_growth_rates_quarterly
variable.description: History: annual growth rates measured each quarter

variable.name: no_firm_births
variable.description: Number of new firms in the economy this month

variable.name: no_firm_deaths
variable.description: Number of firm demises in the economy this month

variable.name: firm_birth_rate
variable.description: Firm birth rate: Number of new firms in the economy this month, divided by the total number of firms that are active this month.

variable.name: firm_death_rate
variable.description: Firm death rate: Number of firm demises in the economy this month, divided by the total number of firms that are active this month.

variable.name: recession_started
variable.description: Indicator signalling the start of a recession. 0: no recession, 1: recession.

variable.name: recession_duration
variable.description: Duration of a recession measured in quarters.

variable.name: firm_average_productivity_progress
variable.description: Average productivity progress of the firms in the last month.

variable.name: firm_average_productivity
variable.description: Average productivty of the firms in the last month.

variable.name: total_capital_stock_units
variable.description: Economy wide total capital stock in units.

variable.name: total_value_mall_inventories
variable.description: Value of goods stored in malls.

variable.name: total_dividends
variable.description: Sum of dividends paid by firms and IG firms.

variable.name: base_wage_offer
variable.description: Mean base wage offer reported by firms

variable.name: just_employed
variable.description: Sum of new hirings.

variable.name: just_unemployed
variable.description: Sum of new firings.

variable.name: start_employed
variable.description: Employed at the beginning of the actual month.

variable.name: start_unemployed
variable.description: Unemployed at the beginning of the actual month.

variable.name: enter_matching
variable.description: Sum of workers entering the matching process.

variable.name: job_seperation_rate
variable.description: just_unemployed/start_employed

variable.name: job_finding_rate
variable.description: just_employed/enter_matching

variable.name: v_u_ratio
variable.description: no_vacancies/unemployed

variable.name: matching_rate
variable.description: just_employed/no_posted_Vacancies

variable.name: consumption_levels
variable.description: Dynamic array of size no. Households, storing the monthly population distribution of household consumption expenditure amounts.

variable.name: median_consumption_level
variable.description: Median value of the population distribution of household consumption levels this month.

variable.name: history_median_consumption_levels
variable.description: History array of size 12, storing the monthly medians of the population distribution of household consumption levels.

variable.name: median_median_consumption_level
variable.description: Median value of the history_median_consumption_level[12] array.

variable.name: minimum_subsistence_level
variable.description: Minimum subsistence level computed as a constant (CONST_MINIMUM_CONSUMPTION_OF_MEDIAN, eg, 0.1 or 0.25) times the median_median_consumption_level.

variable.name: hh_debt_to_income_ratio
variable.description: Household DTI ratio: total mortgage debt (current stock) divided by total annual gross income (12 month trailing sum)

variable.name: hh_debt_service_to_income_ratio
variable.description: Household DSTI ratio: total mortgage payments (12 month trailing sum) divided by total annual gross income (12 month trailing sum)

variable.name: hh_housing_service_to_income_ratio
variable.description: Household HSTI ratio: total rental payments (12 month trailing sum) divided by total annual gross income (12 month trailing sum)

variable.name: hh_interest_annuity_ratio
variable.description: Household total debt interest to annuity ratio

variable.name: hh_hmr_interest_annuity_ratio
variable.description: Household HMR debt interest to annuity ratio

variable.name: hh_op_interest_annuity_ratio
variable.description: Household OP debt interest to annuity ratio

variable.name: total_deposits
variable.description: Deposits summed across all banks.

variable.name: total_bank_reserves
variable.description: Central bank reserves summed across all banks.

variable.name: gov_deposits
variable.description: Deposits summed across all Governments.

variable.name: total_debt_stock_govs
variable.description: Current total debt stock, summed across all Governments. This consists of fiat money created by the CB to finance the budget deficit (debt monetization), and is repaid by Gov's in case of a surplus.

variable.name: inside_total_broad_money_ratio
variable.description: Inside broad money: bank created credit money to total money stock.

variable.name: total_new_credit_business
variable.description: New loan business (volume): new firm loans + new mortgage loans

variable.name: wacf
variable.description: Aggregated WACF: Annualized Weighted Average Cost of Funding per bank, weighted by the volume of this month's total new loan business (mortgages and firm loans), aggregated across all banks, then divided by the total new loan business across all banks (sum of the weights).

variable.name: weighted_funding_costs
variable.description: Weighted Actual Cost of Funding per bank, weighted by the volume of this month's total new loan business (mortgages and firm loans), aggregated across all banks, then divided by the total new loan business across all banks (sum of the weights).

variable.name: bank_deposit_interest_rate
variable.description: Mean deposit interest rate across all active banks.

variable.name: bank_no_mortgages
variable.description: Bank number of mortgages.

variable.name: hh_mortgages_ltv_redraw
variable.description: Indicator to denote that HH has performed a redraw of DSTI, LTV, Maturity.

variable.name: hh_mortgages_ltv_cap_active
variable.description: Indicator to denote that HH has an active LTV cap.

variable.name: hh_mortgages_dsti_cap_active
variable.description: Indicator to denote that HH has an active DSTI cap.

variable.name: no_household_class_1
variable.description: n1 = employed + mortgage

variable.name: no_household_class_2
variable.description: n2 = employed + no mortgage

variable.name: no_household_class_3
variable.description: n3 = unemployed + mortgage

variable.name: no_household_class_4
variable.description: n4 = unemployed + no mortgage

variable.name: bank_sum_weighted_interest_rates_all_firm_loans
variable.description: Sum of volume-weighted interest rates for all firm loans.

variable.name: bank_sum_weighted_interest_rates_new_firm_loans
variable.description: Sum of volume-weighted interest rates for new firm loans.

variable.name: bank_sum_weighted_interest_rate_spreads_new_firm_loans_funding_costs
variable.description: Sum of volume-weighted interest rate spreads (v. funding costs) for new firm loans.

variable.name: bank_sum_weighted_interest_rate_spreads_new_firm_loans_policy_rate
variable.description: Sum of volume-weighted interest rate spreads (v. policy rate) for new firm loans.

variable.name: bank_sum_weighted_interest_rate_spreads_new_firm_loans_wacf
variable.description: Sum of volume-weighted interest rate spreads (v. wacf) for new firm loans.

variable.name: weighted_mean_interest_rate_new_firm_loans
variable.description: Volume-weighted mean of volume-weighted interest rates for new firm loans.

variable.name: weighted_mean_interest_rate_all_firm_loans
variable.description: Volume-weighted mean of volume-weighted interest rates for all firm loans.

variable.name: weighted_mean_interest_rate_spreads_new_firm_loans_funding_costs
variable.description: Volume-weighted mean of volume-weighted interest rate spreads (v. funding costs) for new firm loans.

variable.name: weighted_mean_interest_rate_spreads_new_firm_loans_policy_rate
variable.description: Volume-weighted mean of volume-weighted interest rate spreads (v. policy_rate) for new firm loans.

variable.name: weighted_mean_interest_rate_spreads_new_firm_loans_wacf
variable.description: Volume-weighted mean of volume-weighted interest rate spreads (v. wacf) for new firm loans.

variable.name: bank_sum_weighted_interest_rates_all_mortgages
variable.description: Sum of volume-weighted interest rates for all mortgages.

variable.name: bank_sum_weighted_interest_rates_new_mortgages
variable.description: Sum of volume-weighted interest rates for new mortgages.

variable.name: bank_sum_weighted_interest_rate_spreads_new_mortgages_funding_costs
variable.description: Sum of volume-weighted interest rate spreads (v. funding costs) for new mortgages.

variable.name: bank_sum_weighted_interest_rate_spreads_new_mortgages_policy_rate
variable.description: Sum of volume-weighted interest rate spreads (v. policy rate) for new mortgages.

variable.name: bank_sum_weighted_interest_rate_spreads_new_mortgages_wacf
variable.description: Sum of volume-weighted interest rate spreads (v. wacf) for new mortgages.

variable.name: weighted_mean_interest_rate_new_mortgages
variable.description: Volume-weighted mean of volume-weighted interest rates for new mortgages.

variable.name: weighted_mean_interest_rate_all_mortgages
variable.description: Volume-weighted mean of volume-weighted interest rates for all mortgages.

variable.name: weighted_mean_interest_rate_spreads_new_mortgages_funding_costs
variable.description: Volume-weighted mean of volume-weighted interest rate spreads (v. funding costs) for new mortgages.

variable.name: weighted_mean_interest_rate_spreads_new_mortgages_policy_rate
variable.description: Volume-weighted mean of volume-weighted interest rate spreads (v. policy_rate) for new mortgages.

variable.name: weighted_mean_interest_rate_spreads_new_mortgages_wacf
variable.description: Volume-weighted mean of volume-weighted interest rate spreads (v. wacf) for new mortgages.

variable.name: firm_interest_annuity_ratio
variable.description: Firm total debt interest to annuity ratio

variable.name: firm_dsti
variable.description: Firm DSTI ratio

variable.name: gdp_trailing_sum_qtr
variable.description: GDP 3-month trailing sum, recomputed every month

variable.name: gdp_trailing_avg_qtr
variable.description: GDP 3-month trailing average, recomputed every month

variable.name: gdp_trailing_sum_year
variable.description: GDP 12-month trailing sum, recomputed every month

variable.name: gdp_trailing_avg_year
variable.description: GDP 12-month trailing average, recomputed every month

variable.name: gdp_growth_rate_qoq
variable.description: GDP quarter-on-quarter growth rate, recomputed every month

variable.name: gdp_growth_rate_yoy
variable.description: GDP year-on-year growth rate, recomputed every month

variable.name: gdp_growth_rate_median
variable.description: GDP median growth rate (based on monthly YoY series), recomputed every month

variable.name: output_trailing_sum_qtr
variable.description: Output 3-month trailing sum, recomputed every month

variable.name: output_trailing_avg_qtr
variable.description: Output 3-month trailing average, recomputed every month

variable.name: output_trailing_sum_year
variable.description: Output 12-month trailing sum, recomputed every month

variable.name: output_trailing_avg_year
variable.description: Output 12-month trailing average, recomputed every month

variable.name: output_growth_rate_qoq
variable.description: Output quarter-on-quarter growth rate, recomputed every month

variable.name: output_growth_rate_yoy
variable.description: Output year-on-year growth rate, recomputed every month

variable.name: output_growth_rate_median
variable.description: Output median growth rate (based on monthly YoY series), recomputed every month

variable.name: cpi_inflation_rate_qoq
variable.description: CPI quarter-on-quarter growth rate, recomputed every month

variable.name: cpi_inflation_rate_yoy
variable.description: CPI year-on-year growth rate, recomputed every month

variable.name: cpi_inflation_rate_median
variable.description: CPI median growth rate (based on monthly YoY series), recomputed every month

variable.name: mortgage_credit_trailing_sum_qtr
variable.description: Mortgage credit 3-month trailing sum, recomputed every month

variable.name: mortgage_credit_trailing_avg_qtr
variable.description: Mortgage credit 3-month trailing average, recomputed every month

variable.name: mortgage_credit_trailing_sum_year
variable.description: Mortgage credit 12-month trailing sum, recomputed every month

variable.name: mortgage_credit_trailing_avg_year
variable.description: Mortgage credit 12-month trailing average, recomputed every month

variable.name: mortgage_credit_growth_rate_qoq
variable.description: Mortgage credit quarter-on-quarter growth rate, recomputed every month

variable.name: mortgage_credit_growth_rate_yoy
variable.description: Mortgage credit year-on-year growth rate, recomputed every month

variable.name: mortgage_credit_growth_rate_median
variable.description: Mortgage credit median growth rate (based on monthly YoY series), recomputed every month

variable.name: firm_credit_trailing_sum_qtr
variable.description: Firm credit 3-month trailing sum, recomputed every month

variable.name: firm_credit_trailing_avg_qtr

function.name: Eurostat_initialization
function.description: Initialization function for Eurostat.

function.name: idle
function.description: Idle for initialization function.

function.name: Eurostat_compute_house_price_index
function.description: Function to compute the housing price/rental price index. Note: this function runs monthly, on day 2, when iteration_loop is greater than init_transient_period (=6002).

function.name: idle
function.description: Idle for Eurostat_compute_house_price_index

function.name: idle
function.description: Idle for Eurostat_send_subsistence_level

function.name: Eurostat_send_subsistence_level
function.description: Function to compute minimum subsistence level.

function.name: Eurostat_send_data
function.description: Eurostat sends the data to the other agents

function.name: idle
function.description: Eurostat does nothing

function.name: Eurostat_read_policy_announcements
function.description: Eurostat receives macroprudential policy announcements from ECB

function.name: Eurostat_calculate_data
function.description: Eurostat calculates the global and regional macro data based on the received micro data

function.name: Eurostat_store_history_monthly
function.description: Eurostat stores monthly macro data in its history struct.

function.name: Eurostat_compute_growth_rates_monthly
function.description: Eurostat computes monthly growth rates for macro data stored in its monthly history struct.

function.name: idle
function.description: Eurostat does nothing

function.name: Eurostat_store_history_quarterly
function.description: Eurostat stores quarterly macro data in its history struct.

function.name: Eurostat_compute_growth_rates_quarterly
function.description: Eurostat computes quarterly growth rates for macro data stored in its quarterly history struct.

function.name: Eurostat_measure_recession
function.description: Eurostat measures the start or end of recessions.

function.name: idle
function.description: Eurostat does nothing

function.name: Eurostat_idle
function.description: Eurostat idle

variable.name: bank_balance_sheet_calendar
variable.description: Balance sheet consisting of adts for stocks and flows

variable.name: bank_stocks_calendar
variable.description: stock adt for monetary stocks at the end of the calendar month

variable.name: bank_outflows_calendar
variable.description: outflows adt for monetary outflows during the calendar month

variable.name: bank_inflows_calendar
variable.description: inflows adt for monetary outflows during the calendar month

variable.name: total_income
variable.description: Sum of inflows

variable.name: total_expenses
variable.description: Sum of outflows

variable.name: total_assets
variable.description: Sum of assets

variable.name: total_liabilities
variable.description: Sum of liabilities

variable.name: bank_inflows_monthly_mortgage_payments
variable.description: Monthly inflow of mortgage payments

variable.name: bank_outflows_monthly_mortgage_issues
variable.description: Monthly outflow of mortgage issues

variable.name: bank_no_mortgages
variable.description: Bank number of mortgages.

variable.name: bank_no_mortgages_new
variable.description: new loan business, number of new mortgage loans

variable.name: bank_mortgages_new_business
variable.description: new loan business, volume of new mortgage loans

variable.name: no_mortgages_outstanding
variable.description: Number of total outstanding mortgages

function.name: Bank_initialization
function.description: Initialization function for Bank.

function.name: idle
function.description: Idle for initialization function.

function.name: Bank_read_policy_announcements
function.description: Bank reads policy announcements from Government.

function.name: Bank_reset_variables
function.description: Function to reset bank balance sheet flow variables. Activation: 1st day of calendar month.

variable.name: ecb_balance_sheet_calendar
variable.description: Balance sheet consisting of adts for stocks and flows

variable.name: ecb_stocks_calendar
variable.description: stock adt for monetary stocks at the end of the calendar month

variable.name: ecb_outflows_calendar
variable.description: outflows adt for monetary outflows during the calendar month

variable.name: ecb_inflows_calendar
variable.description: inflows adt for monetary outflows during the calendar month

variable.name: bond_holdings_value
variable.description: Total monetary amount of the ECBs government bond holdings.

variable.name: nr_gov_bonds
variable.description: Bond holdings of the Central Bank.

variable.name: fiat_money_govs
variable.description: Monetization of government debt.

variable.name: fiat_money_bond_govs
variable.description: Quantitative easing: money created to buy government bonds.

variable.name: bank_interest
variable.description: Net interest payments received from banks (interest recieved on ECB debts - interest paid on overnight deposits).

variable.name: gov_interest
variable.description: Bond coupon payments received on bond holdings.

variable.name: gov_bond_purchase
variable.description: Amount of bond purchases.

variable.name: total_income
variable.description: Sum of inflows

variable.name: total_expenses
variable.description: Sum of outflows

variable.name: total_assets
variable.description: Sum of assets

variable.name: total_liabilities
variable.description: Sum of liabilities

variable.name: balance_sheet_delta_abs
variable.description: Absolute difference of balance sheet identity; equity as residual vs equity variable

variable.name: monthly_profit
variable.description: monthly profit

function.name: Mall_send_id_to_firms
function.description: In this function the mall sends its id to the firms. The firms can set up its data array properly if the population file was built with the cloning procedure.

function.name: Mall_initialize_firm_arrays
function.description: In case of cloned population: Malls receive firm ids and set up their memory variables that are related to the firms.

function.name: ClearingHouse_initialization
function.description: Initialization function for Bank.

function.name: idle
function.description: Idle for initialization function.

function.name: idle
function.description: Idle connecting Statistical init functions to AFM.

function.name: Clearinghouse_send_data_to_Eurostat
function.description: Clearinghouse sends statistical data to Eurostat.

function.name: idle
function.description: Idle connecting Statistical init functions to AFM.

variable.name: regulatory_capital_buffer
variable.description: Final total regulatory_capital_buffer. Components: const_regulatory_capital_buffer, counter_cyclical_capital_buffer + capital_conservation_buffer

variable.name: counter_cyclical_capital_buffer
variable.description: CCyB

variable.name: capital_conservation_buffer
variable.description: CCoB

function.name: idle
function.description: Idle for initialization function.

function.name: Central_Bank_initialization
function.description: Initialization function for Central_Bank.

function.name: idle
function.description: Idle for initialization function.

message.name: firm_send_data
message.description: Message sent by firms to Eurostat. Includes micro data.

message.name: household_send_data
message.description: Sent by households to eurostat. Includes micro data.

message.name: eurostat_send_specific_skills
message.description: Sent by Eurostat. Includes the average specific skills of the different general skill groups for each region.

message.name: data_for_government
message.description: Message sent by Eurostat to governments. Includes the region_id and gdp for the region. Used by gov to compute its GDP. Also contains the mean wage for the region.

variable.name: region_id
variable.description: Region to which the data applies.

variable.name: gdp
variable.description: GDP in the region.

variable.name: mean_wage
variable.description: Mean wage in the region.

variable.name: output
variable.description: Monthly output

variable.name: potential_output
variable.description: Potential output is used to compute the output gap, needed for monetary policy rules (Taylor rule). This target output is total output of all firms at full production capacity (not at full employment of labour).

message.name: msg_skills_eurostat_to_igfirm
message.description: Eurostat sends average general skills, aberage specific skills and the average productivity progress of the total economy to the IG firm There it is needed for determining the IG price

message.name: msg_market_sizes
message.description: Eurostat sends average general skills, aberage specific skills and the average productivity progress of the total economy to the IG firm. There it is needed for determining the IG price
